topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
A victim lost over $282 million in Bitcoin (BTC) and Litecoin (LTC) in a massive social engineering scam involving a hardware wallet. The attacker, who impersonated Trezor customer support to obtain the victim's seed phrase, converted the stolen funds into Monero (XMR) and used THORChain to bridge assets to other networks, causing a sharp spike in XMR's price.
Sources:
- https://cryptopotato.com/massive-hardware-wallet-scam-victim-loses-280m-as-funds-move-to-monero
- https://beincrypto.com/bitcoin-heist-leads-to-monero-price-rally
- https://web3isgoinggreat.com/single/trezor-support-scam
